content: Backend: Create lotions catalog API (/api/lotions) with CRUD (create, list, update minimal) secured via JWT; model uses UUID, UTC datetimes; fields include name, brand, price, features, tattoo_guard, image_url, active.
Backend: Extend payments to support lotion checkout (amount from DB via lotion_id); keep tanning package flow backward compatible.
Mary Well prompt + chat flow: add lotion discovery questions and education; add Browse Lotions UI in chat; enable Checkout for lotion and tanning with discount auto-apply for tanning.
Admin UI: Add Lotions tab under /admin with form to add and table to view; uses admin token; no arbitrary prices.
Visuals: Update Laundry hero to provided Eastend photo; add Tanning hero video placeholder (poster=provided image), ask for final video link.
Test end-to-end: lotion creation → chat browse → checkout link opens; tanning checkout with discount still works; update screenshots.
